attributes.action: stop trying to con us on global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why when it is scientifically proven that the earth is warming naturally as it has done in the past since time began, and is nothing to do with our carbon emissions, Is the Government using this as another way to get money out of us all with higher taxes on fuel and what ever else they can come up with, this must be questioned !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
